title: Stars and Satellites
description: Hayley Foster had an imaginary friend growing up like most children.Unlike most other children though, her imaginery friend turns out to be real when he suddenly returns to her life after eight years.Her imaginery friend Alex, is in fact, her guardian angel. But his sudden reappearance soon turns out to be the first of a series of strange events and happenings in the city of Glasgow.Join Hayley and Alex on an adventure of mystery, intrigue, comedy and demons as they try to unravel the truth about what is really going on in Scotland's second city, while Hayley tries to work out the questions she's dying to know - is she going mad? And where has Alex really been all these years?But her journey may lead her to the most important answer of all; who she really is.
author: Terry  Reid
